reviewText: Disappointing. The lecturer is reading slides .Appreciate if she could answer some of the questions presented

Very Very Poor... I have literarly wasted a ton of money over this. No solved examples or solutions provided to practice.Honestly, your tactics are useless if you cannot provide solved examples.Want a refund. Will rate Coursera poorly as well for keeping such a poor course.
not informative, assignments are not into Bloom's taxonomy
just basic information. a little disappointed.
Covers the basics. I expected more practice.
it should have practical exercises

the tips are too general. I've heard the tips from YouTube for free lessons by an ex-examiner for IELTS more specifically than this course. But it's OK. at least I got a little insight about the IELTS test from this course.
T​he contents in this lecture is quite helpful but the quality of recording is not good actually. For example, sometimes the audio is cutted off.
Listening part was a bit off as compare to writing and speaking teaching.

The tips and strategies provided by the course was great. But I was expecting more than that like real listening and speaking questions in the assignment sections. I think that could help more for ielts practice. Otherwise this course has awesome content for ielts listening and speaking tips.
It offered lots of useful tips in how to prepare for the IELTS but doesn't include exercises for practice, which I wish it would've been offered too
like it. gave me goot tips

This course gives very useful information and tips. You can learn about strategies and get links to websites and related articles. All explanations are clear and easy to understand. Thanks so much for this course!

It is such a good course to introduce speaking and listening in IELTS test. However, I was expecting more quizzes for practicing listening test rather than quizzes about technical think such as "How long does it take to complete the IELTS speaking test" or "Should I memorize some answers before the test".
Learned about Listening and Speaking skills and it helps me to build up my Language skills.

Quite explanatory. I have taken TOEFL before but not IELTS. And the instructor was great in explaining how IELTS Test is different from TOEFL and ins and outs of the listening section. I would recommend it to everyone trying to familiarise themselves with the IELTS listening & speaking section.
Really good course
It's the best course for everyone who wants to get the best band in the IELTS exam.
